verbose_text: In univariate analysis (XREF_TABLE) the risk factors for 5y survival in all patients with HCC were preoperative total bilirubin level> 1.5 mg/dl (P = 0.03), serum AFP level> 400 ng/ml (P = 0.02), macrovascular invasion (P = 0.02), TTV> 65.5 cm 3 (P = 0.02), pathological tumor grades III & IV (P = 0.4), microvascular invasion (P = 0.01), postoperative hepatic decompensation (P = 0.01).
